channel.title: Ortonville Farmers Market
channel.description: Recent content on Ortonville Farmers Market

item.title: Thanks for Contacting Us
item.description: Thanks for touching base with us. Someone from the Market will be in touch soon.

item.title: 10 Reasons to Support Farmers Markets
item.description: From savoring produce at the peak of freshness to meeting the people who grow your food, there are countless reasons to support farmers markets. Here are just a few! Taste Real Flavors The fruits and vegetables you buy at the farmers market are the freshest and tastiest available. Fruits are allowed to ripen fully in the field and are brought directly to youâ€”no long-distance shipping, no gassing to simulate the ripening process, no sitting for weeks in storage.

item.title: Join the Market
item.description: Interested in becoming a vendor at the market? Great, we are interested in having you join! The first step is to read and fill out the vendor application here. This application can be printed and mailed to the Ortonville DDA office at 476 Mill Street, Ortonville, MI 48462, or can be emailed as an attachment to ortonvillefarmersmarket@gmail.com The next step is to read and sign the market rules.
